author: BBC Sport
description: Ian Poulter savours his second-place finish at the Players Championship after a "miserable" period out injured.
title: Ian Poulter: Players Championship runner-up upbeat after 'toughest stretch'

author: BBC Sport
description: After his "toughest stretch", Ian Poulter showed at the Players Championship that he is not done yet, writes Iain Carter.
title: Players Championship: Ian Poulter shows fire still burns bright - Iain Carter
